use_cases.description: Allows users to authenticate using their username and password to access the system.
Allows users to authenticate using their Google account for quick access to the system.
Allows users to securely end their session and log out of the system.
Allows users to request a password reset link via email when they forget their password.
Allows users to set a new password using a valid reset token received via email.
Allows users to change their current password while logged in to the system.
Allows users to view their personal profile information including name, email, avatar, and role-specific details.
Allows students to view their personalized dashboard with upcoming classes, attendance statistics, and quick access shortcuts.
Allows students to view their class and exam schedule in calendar format, filtered by semester.
Allows students to view their personal attendance history with status details, statistics, and exam eligibility information.
Allows students to view detailed information about a specific slot including time, room, lecturer, and subject for their enrolled slots.
Allows lecturers to view their personalized dashboard with upcoming teaching slots, attendance summary, and quick access shortcuts.
Allows lecturers to view their teaching schedule in calendar or table format, filtered by semester and slot category (Regular/Exam).
Allows lecturers to update slot category between LECTURE and LECTURE_WITH_PT for their assigned slots.
Allows lecturers and supervisors to initiate an automated attendance session (regular or exam) for a slot using face recognition.
Allows lecturers and supervisors to stop the currently running attendance session (regular or exam) for a slot.
Allows lecturers and supervisors to trigger a re-scan for attendance during an active session to capture late arrivals.
Allows lecturers and supervisors to view the student roster and real-time attendance status for a specific slot.
Allows authorized users to manually update attendance status for students with mandatory remark (e.g., Late, Excused Absence).
Allows authorized users to add explanatory notes to attendance records for documentation purposes.
Allows authorized users to update existing attendance remarks for accuracy or additional context.
Allows lecturers to view comprehensive attendance summary report for a class in matrix format with exam eligibility status.
Allows lecturers to export class attendance summary report to CSV or Excel format.
Allows lecturers to export detailed attendance records for all slots in a class.
Allows supervisors to view their personalized dashboard with upcoming exam supervision slots and attendance summary.
Allows supervisors to view their exam supervision schedule in calendar or table format, filtered by semester.
Allows supervisors to view attendance summary report for a FINAL_EXAM slot with subject filtering.
Allows supervisors and data operators to export exam slot attendance report to CSV or Excel format.
Allows data operators to view system overview with charts, statistics, and quick access to main functions.
Allows data operators to create a new semester with code, name, start date, and end date.
Allows data operators to view the list of all semesters with search and filter capabilities.
Allows data operators to view detailed information of a specific semester.
Allows data operators to update semester information including activation/deactivation status.
Allows data operators to permanently delete a semester if no related data exists.
Allows data operators to bulk import semesters from a CSV file with validation and error reporting.
Allows data operators to create a new major with code and name.
Allows data operators to view the list of all majors with search and filter capabilities.
Allows data operators to view detailed information of a specific major.
Allows data operators to update major information including activation/deactivation status.
Allows data operators to permanently delete a major if no related data exists.
Allows data operators to bulk import majors from a CSV file with validation and error reporting.
Allows data operators to create a new subject with code, name, and associated majors.
Allows data operators to view the list of all subjects with search and filter capabilities.
Allows data operators to view detailed information of a specific subject including associated majors.
Allows data operators to update subject information including activation/deactivation status.
Allows data operators to permanently delete a subject if no related data exists.
Allows data operators to bulk import subjects from a CSV file with validation and error reporting.
Allows data operators to create a new class with code, subject, and semester.
Allows data operators to view the list of all classes with search and filter by semester, subject, or major.
Allows data operators to view detailed information of a specific class including enrolled students.
Allows data operators to update class information including activation/deactivation status.
Allows data operators to permanently delete a class if no related data exists.
Allows data operators to bulk import classes from a CSV file with validation and error reporting.
Allows data operators to view the list of students enrolled in a specific class.
Allows data operators to add or remove students from a class enrollment.
Allows data operators to bulk import student enrollments to a class from a CSV file.
Allows data operators to create a new slot with time, room, staff, category, and optional class assignment.
Allows data operators to view the list of all slots with search and filter by semester, class, date, or category.
Allows data operators to view detailed information of a specific slot including assigned subjects and participants.
Allows data operators to update slot information including time, room, staff, and description.
Allows data operators to permanently delete a slot if no related attendance data exists.
Allows data operators to bulk import slots from a CSV file with validation and error reporting.
Allows data operators to assign or remove subjects that can be tested in a FINAL_EXAM slot.
Allows data operators to add or remove students as participants for a specific subject in a FINAL_EXAM slot.

use_cases.use_case: Import Exam Slot Participants via CSV
use_cases.description: Allows data operators to bulk import exam slot participants from a CSV file with student ID and subject code.
Allows data operators to create a new student account with profile information and major assignment.
Allows data operators to view the list of all student accounts with search and filter capabilities.
Allows data operators to view detailed information of a specific student account and profile.
Allows data operators to update student information including personal details and account activation status.
Allows data operators to permanently delete a student account and profile.
Allows data operators to bulk import student accounts from a CSV file with validation and error reporting.
Allows data operators to create a new staff account with profile information and role assignment.
Allows data operators to view the list of all staff accounts with search and filter capabilities.
Allows data operators to view detailed information of a specific staff account and profile.
Allows data operators to update staff information including personal details, role assignment, and account activation status.
Allows data operators to permanently delete a staff account and profile.
Allows data operators to bulk import staff accounts from a CSV file with validation and error reporting.
Allows data operators to create a new room with name and location information.
Allows data operators to view the list of all rooms with search and filter capabilities.
Allows data operators to view detailed information of a specific room including assigned cameras.
Allows data operators to update room information including activation/deactivation status.
Allows data operators to permanently delete a room if no related data exists.
Allows data operators to bulk import rooms from a CSV file with validation and error reporting.
Allows data operators to create a new camera with name, RTSP URL, and room assignment.
Allows data operators to view the list of all cameras with search, filter, and connection status.
Allows data operators to view detailed information of a specific camera including configuration and status.
Allows data operators to update camera information including RTSP URL, room assignment, and activation status.
Allows data operators to permanently delete a camera.
Allows data operators to bulk import cameras from a CSV file with validation and error reporting.
